alert.note: Alert for Dawson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:29PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dawson County through 400 PM CDT... At 328 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Gothenburg, or 22 miles northwest of Lexington, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... or just north of Cozad around 340 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
